column1: members of the Court Martial have arrived at their decision, after having
been correctly assessed of the law and after having been satisfied of the
truthfulness and reliability of the evidence of the witnesses.
Defence of Alibi Advanced by the Petitioner
The  Petitioner  has  taken  up  the  defence  of  alibi  in  his  dock  statement
before  the  Court  Martial.  It  is  stated  that  on  08.04.2009  between  5.45
p.m./6.00 p.m. to 11.30 p.m. to 11.45 p.m. the Petitioner was at a party
at  the  Wardroom  of  the  Welisara  Navy  Camp.  Hence,  the  Petitioner
claims that he was not present at the place of crime at Kaduwela.
